name: CCTAN by 111%
description:
Spin your elephant around and shoot down the blocks coming from all the sides!
It is important to move smartly and adjust the angle.
How long can you keep your elephant alive?
Shoot down the block quickly to protect your elephant!!

CCTAN by 111%
Features
- Unlock 50 balls including some unique balls, simple balls and super mini ball, etc.
- Challenge your friends with GameCenter support.
- Check facebook page, 111%, for getting hidden ball.
